survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of the Annual Tech Industry Networking Event to improve future events.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced for neutrality.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?

questions.question_text: Which of the following event features did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify high-value features.

script.question_text: Which of the following event features did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make during the event?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear ranges to quantify connections.

script.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make during the event?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving future networking events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving future networking events?

questions.question_text: Would you attend this event again next year?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point agreement scale to measure likelihood of return attendance.

script.question_text: Would you attend this event again next year?
